prompts: Create a sleek, dark Pokemon with glowing yellow accents and a mysterious aura.
Imagine a shadowy feline creature that thrives in the moonlight and has a calming presence.
Design an elegant creature with a jet-black body and bright yellow rings that represents the night.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies stealth and agility, with a sleek design and captivating eyes.
Generate a nocturnal Pokemon that roams forests and has a dark, alluring appearance.
Make a creature that is both playful and elusive, with a shiny black coat and striking features.
Give me a Pokemon that blends seamlessly with the shadows, radiating an aura of calm confidence.

distinctive_features: Glowing yellow rings on ears and tail
